name: Coopilots!
description:
PITCH

Cooperate up to 4 players aboard a spaceship and overcome many challenges and dangers while exploring a dangerous desert planet!

Members of the crew can manipulate every station on the ship, such as its cannons, energy shield or piloting, and must adapt to all situations, as perilous as they might be. Collect powerful upgrades hidden throughout the world to enhance your vessel and attain victory!

GAMEPLAY

TRAILER
